message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $6,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $6,000 and $9,000. How about we try $7,500?
